title.rendered: Signature Global City 37D 2: Premium Independent Floors in Gurugram

content.rendered:
With the grand accomplishment of Signature Global City 37D, the Group has come up with its new project Signature Global City 37D 2. This hub of premium independent floors in Gurugram offers a contemporary lifestyle and sprawls across 5.62 acres enclosed by a massive verdant landscape. Welcome to Signature Global City 37D II, a project that possesses flamboyant features & aesthetics based on the contemporary requirements of the home buyers. This is a cluster of low rise premium floors in Gurugram that has been planned under the norms prescribed by the Deen Dayal Jan Awaas Yojna (DDJAY), an initiative by the Haryana Government.


The project’s structure is designed with sustainable approaches in mind, while also considering the needs of today’s home buyers. These low rise premium floors in near Dwarka Expressway  are a master piece architecture of which has been catered by the famous Padma Bhushan Architect Hafeez Contractor. The interior of this project is in the hands of the internationally renowned interior designer Sonali Bhagwati. Signature Global City 37D 2 is thus envisioned to be the embodiment of perfection created for the elite lifestyle.


Signature Global City 37D 2 is also Edge Certified which means these are Green Homes and the construction is environment-friendly & the materials used are non-toxic. The designing of the project has been planned according to the surrounding nature along with sustainable use of natural resources. The structure of the project focuses on use of renewable resources, reusing domestic byproducts & recycling renewable resources. These features result in a better living condition with low maintenance cost, better indoor air-quality & much more. Given below are the features of Green Homes that can be seen in this project.


Key Features of Green Homes

  • Energy-efficient Walls
  • Natural Ventilation
  • Operational Energy Saving Features
  • Optimum Window-to-wall Ratio (WWR)
  • Reflective Roof
  • High Thermal Performance Windows
  • Water Saving Features
  • Low Flow Water Closet
  • Low Flow Water Fixtures (taps, showerheads)
  • Rainwater Harvesting
  • Waste Water Treatment & Reuse
  • Embodied Energy Saving Features
  • Low Embodied Energy Materials (walls, floor & roof slab, flooring & window frames) and many more such features

Signature Global City 37D 2 is well-connected to major highways where you can enjoy the good life with world-class security & amenities. Consider the excellent connectivity that this Signature Global project offers. It is well-connected via major highways and connecting routes. The growing neighborhood highlights the area’s road and transportation infrastructure. The project is well-connected to other sectors such as Sector 37C, Sector 100, Sector 9, Sector 9B, Sector 10A, Sector 102, Sector 104, Sector 84, Sector 88, Sector 88A, Sector 89 and Sector 99 because it is located in the heart of the suburb Dwarka Expressway. Pataudi Road, which runs from Signature Global City 37DII, is the closest connecting point to major Gurgaon landmarks.

There are a total of 335 units in this amazingly plotted project. The project has 2 & 3 BHK premium independent floors in Gurugram that comes with magnificent amenities and features. These amenities will ease your life and will help you relax with your loved ones. Along with these the Group also provides dedicated car parking & lift for stilt + 4 floors. Management of these are also handled by the Group making sure the proper functioning of each of these amenities. Enlisted are these interestingly strategized amenities.


  • Outdoor Gym
  • Yoga Lawn
  • Butterfly Garden
  • Pathway
  • Senior Citizen’s Area Covered With Trellis
  • Kid’s Play Area
  • Board Games
  • Informal Seating Area
  • Jogging Track
  • Deck
  • Swimming Pool
  • Amphitheater
  • Lawn
  • Play Court
  • Kid’s Swimming Pool
  • Pet Park
  • Terrace Garden
  • Modular Kitchen
  • Half Basketball Court
  • Driveway
  • Sitting Area

Marble flooring, acrylic paint, glass railings, designer false ceilings, laminated wooden floor in the bedroom, ISI marked CP fittings, anti-skid ceramic tiles in the washrooms and balconies, ISI marked switches and sockets, and so on are among the project specifications of these luxury independent floors in Gurugram. Signature Global  uses top brands such as Cartsil, Jaquar, Dorset, Kajaria, Polycab, Asian Paints, Saint-Gobain, OTIS, Hindware, Syska, and Bajaj to improve the customer experience. Signature Global City 37D 2 is indeed a property that will not only improve your life for the better but will also motivate you to truly start an independent life, while building a legacy for your loved ones.
